body:
**What happened**:
We applied an ingress with annotations that had integers as values but no annotations were applied in Kubernetes and no failure was thrown.

**What you expected to happen**:
We would expect an error to be thrown similar to this one:
`error: services "your-service" could not be patched: cannot convert int64 to string`

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
Create a file `anno-test-service.yaml` with the following:
```yml
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    test.key: "1"
    #test.key: 2
  name: anno-test-service
  namespace: default
spec:
spec:
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 80
    targetPort: http
```
Apply, `kubectl apply -f ./anno-test-service.yaml`
Verify, `kubectl get service anno-test-service -o yaml | grep "test.key"`

Uncomment `test.key: 2`
Apply, `kubectl apply -f ./anno-test-service.yaml`
Verify, `kubectl get service anno-test-service -o yaml | grep "test.key"`

You will see that it fails to apply any annotations this time but continued to apply the service without errors.  To get an error edit manually with `kubectl edit service anno-test-service` and add `test.key: 2`.



**Anything else we need to know?**:
This bug can be replicated on anything that uses annotations as long as it is applied using a file: `kubectl apply -f`

We have confirmed this exists on `1.10.x` -> `1.12.x` versions of kubectl

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"10+", GitVersion:"v1.10.7-gke.9", GitCommit:"474de708598cdefe41816d37ba8e2de66a2d4d55", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-11-02T23:44:11Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.3b4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
**Google GKE**
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
**Ubuntu**
- Kubectl Version:
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"10", GitVersion:"v1.10.7", GitCommit:"0c38c362511b20a098d7cd855f1314dad92c2780", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-08-20T10:09:03Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}
```
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"12", GitVersion:"v1.12.2", GitCommit:"17c77c7898218073f14c8d573582e8d2313dc740", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-10-24T06:54:59Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}
```
- Stackdriver logs:
**Manual Edit Failure**:
```
{
 insertId:  "ezs8fceiw238"  
 labels: {
  cluster_version:  "1.10.7-gke.9"   
 }
 logName:  "projects/cloud-dev/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity"  
 protoPayload: {
  @type:  "type.googleapis.com/google.cloud.audit.AuditLog"    
  methodName:  "io.k8s.extensions.v1beta1.ingresses.patch"   
  request: {
   @type:  "k8s.io/Patch"    
   metadata: {
    annotations: {
     ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-connect-timeout:  60      
    }
   }
  }
  resourceName:  "extensions/v1beta1/namespaces/kube-system/ingresses/kube-dashboard"   
  response: {
   @type:  "core.k8s.io/v1.Status"    
   apiVersion:  "v1"    
   code:  500    
   kind:  "Status"    
   message:  "cannot convert int64 to string"    
   status:  "Failure"    
  }
  serviceName:  "k8s.io"    
 }
 receiveTimestamp:  "2018-11-12T20:28:53.543783353Z"  
 severity:  "ERROR"  
 timestamp:  "2018-11-12T20:28:47.983545Z"  
}
```

**kubectl file apply success (but failed to apply annotations, they are NULL)**:
```
{
 insertId:  "18ot33oei0sx8"  
labels: {
  cluster_version:  "1.10.7-gke.9"   
 }
 logName:  "projects/cloud-dev/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity"  
 protoPayload: {
  @type:  "type.googleapis.com/google.cloud.audit.AuditLog"   
  methodName:  "io.k8s.extensions.v1beta1.ingresses.patch"   
  request: {
   @type:  "k8s.io/Patch"    
   metadata: {
    annotations: {
     ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-signin:  null      
     ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-url:  null      
     ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect:  null      
     ingress.kubernetes.io/whitelist-source-range:  null      
     kubectl.kubernetes.io/last-applied-configuration:  "{"apiVersion":"extensions/v1beta1","kind":"Ingress","metadata":{"annotations":{},"name":"kube-dashboard","namespace":"kube-system"},"spec":{"rules":[{"host":"kube.dev.cloud","http":{"paths":[{"backend":{"serviceName":"kube-dashboard","servicePort":80},"path":"/"}]}}],"tls":[{"hosts":["kube.dev.cloud"],"secretName":"tls-env-cloud"}]}}
"      
     kubernetes.io/ingress.class:  null      
     kubernetes.io/tls-acme:  null      
    }
   }
  }
  resourceName:  "extensions/v1beta1/namespaces/kube-system/ingresses/kube-dashboard"   
  serviceName:  "k8s.io"   
 }
 receiveTimestamp:  "2018-11-12T20:35:50.350227061Z"  
 severity:  "NOTICE"  
 timestamp:  "2018-11-12T20:35:43.100513Z"  
}
```

/kind bug

title: Annotations broken with 'kubectl apply -f'
